page.title: 14PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content: {15 Corporation bus routes}serve this area operating mainly from 0530 to 2330 ( except Sundays and Public Holidays when limited services run.) No more than 2 buses need be taken to reach anywhere in the city. Most destinations can be reached by 1 bus as many of the routes are{circular.}1 night bus serves a part of the area. { Adult fares}vary from 15p to 50p per journey but cheaper unlimited {ridacards}are available at Â£9.40 for 2 weeks to an annual Â£176. Children under 15 travel at about half fare. The{SMT National Bus Company}run buses through the area to coastal and inland towns and villages. Buses to London travel through but do not stop. There are no railway stations in the area but freight traffic is very heavy due to the{Freightliner terminal}in Portobello.
